text: Hello, How can I link images in my  (s)css? Where should I upload mij images and what path would I use to make it relative? That when I use this theme in another environment that my images still work...
I Tryed a lot of things, but never got the proper url for my images in my minified css...

For images that are part of a theme, you need to use the `get_asset_url` function. I recommend you take a look at the <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate|cms theme boilerplate> for accessing images in a theme.

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CSFGKSHT7/p1601562263042900|here is a post> on how to do this with a scss setup.
Hi <@U3T21PDBK>, Please disregard, I saw that there is typo error, I already corrected it. Thanks for looking at this.
